results.title: The US is throwing big money at rare-earth tech, taking on China's dominance with new chemistry
results.snippet: Looking ahead: The rare-earth sector now sits at the intersection of chemistry, geopolitics, and industrial finance. On one side lies a legacy global system dominated by large solvent-extraction complexes concentrated in China; on the other is an emerging ...
